context_bundle.summary: Compliance scanning and enforcement for CIS benchmarks, NIST, ISO 27001, HIPAA, and PCI DSS using Intune policies, Chef InSpec, and Puppet remediation

onboarding.quick_start: Create compliance policies in Intune or MDM, use Chef InSpec profiles for automated testing, implement Puppet for drift remediation
common_patterns: Intune: deviceCompliancePolicy with password, encryption, firewall, AV requirements
Chef InSpec: Write control blocks testing security configurations
Puppet: Declarative compliance classes for automatic remediation
CIS Benchmarks: Industry-standard security configuration guidelines
Compliance frameworks: NIST, ISO 27001, HIPAA, PCI DSS, SOC 2
Reporting: Device compliance dashboards, audit logs, remediation tracking
known_errors: Test compliance policies in pilot groups first
Some settings require device restart to apply
